title: HAP 90 - Move Fast and Break Things - C.L.R. James
itunes:title: HAP 90 - Move Fast and Break Things - C.L.R. James
description: The Trinidadian historian and cultural critic C.L.R. James applies Marxist analysis to the Haitian Revolution, American cinema, and Shakespeare.
